text: The Stockholm Marathon is an annual marathon event in Stockholm, Sweden. Held since 1979, it also serves as the Swedish national marathon championship. The 2020 edition was cancelled because of the coronavirus pandemic. The 2021 comeptition was also postponed and held held on Saturday 9 October. ==Winners== Key: ===Men=== Year Athlete Country Time (h:m:s) 1979 Jukka Toivola 2:17:35 1980 Jeff Wells 2:15:49 1981 Bill Rodgers 2:13:26 1982 Kjell- Erik Ståhl -
